**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [General Avinash Jurrg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2330) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 385 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +26, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +24, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +24, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +26 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+1 [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, [_+1 composite longbow_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), _[+2 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_ --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +24 **Will** +24 +1 status on all saves **HP** 225 , regeneration 15 (deactivated by acid or fire) **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** _greatsword_ +30 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d12+12 slashing **Ranged** _composite longbow_ +28 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [volley 30 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+4 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 36 - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will) - **4th** [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288) - **6th** [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36) - **7th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47) **Battlefield Command** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** General Jurrg roars out a simple command during battle, using his supernatural power to force a foe within 30 feet to pursue a tactic in combat. The targeted creature must attempt a DC 34 Will save and is thereafter temporarily immune to new Battlefield Commands for 24 hours. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) 1 as their mind rails against the command. **Failure** The creature must spend 1 action at the start of their turn to perform a [basic action](/Rules.aspx?ID=439) commanded by the general, chosen from those listed on pages 470–471 of the Pathfinder Core Rulebook.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature must spend all 3 actions to perform basic actions commanded by the general. At the end of their turn, they must save against Battlefield Command again to determine how the effect continues into their next turn, but each time this save is attempted the DC is reduced by 2. **Change Shape** (concentrate, polymorph, primal, transmutation) The onidoshi takes on the appearance of an ogre. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage.
name: General Avinash Jurrg
